The special election in Alabama last night didn't go the way the president wanted.

Moore is a controversial guy.
He's a former state Supreme Court justice who was dismissed twice from that job.
He's an anti-establishment conservative who talks in blunt terms and has offended a lot of people along the way.
He says that makes him politically incorrect just like President Trump.

Hi, Mara.
Hi, Ailsa.

I mean whoever won the Republican primary will probably be the next senator, right?

Yeah.
It means that Donald Trump has a loyal base, but it's not necessarily transferable to other candidates.
